name: White Noise (Orllewin)
description:
Plays soothing meandering white noise to help you sleep, or as an ambient background while you work.

The Playdate speaker is tiny so for best results you really need to use with headphones or an external speaker.

The default mode is Automatic which slowly changes the frequency to vary the soundscape. If you press A you toggle to manual mode where the frequency remains constant and is modulated by turning the crank.


To load the zipped .pdx  onto your Playdate follow the official side-loading guide.
View the homepage for White Noise.
